questions.question: What are the advantages of C++?
questions.details: C++ doesn't only maintains all aspects from C language, it also simplifies memory management and adds several features like classes, inhertance etc.
questions.shortAns: it is C++ is a highly portable language

questions.question: What are the different types of polymorphism in C++?
questions.details: Polymorphism means multiple forms. It means having more than one function with the same function name but with different functionalities
